Welcome to dummy2’s documentation!¶

Python Documentation and Releasing Project¶

Introduction¶

This project is an attempt at documenting Python code and prepare a ready-to- release Python package, including proper tests and documentations. The ultimate goal of this project is to release a Python package of John A. Marohn (jam99@cornell.edu) onto GitHub and PyPI.

Authors:Hoang Long Nguyen
Email:hn269@cornell.edu

The dummy2 program¶

This program was developed in the course of this project. This is a simple dummy text editor.

Links:¶

ReadTheDocs: https://readthedocs.org/projects/dummy2/

Quickstart:¶

  • Run dummy2.exe
  • Edit text, open and save files

Dependencies:¶

jinja 2.7.2 for documentation.

  • dummy2 package
    • Submodules
    • dummy2.dummy2.0 module
